title.value: Efficiency of herbicides tank mixtures with SAS, applied in fibre flax seedlings
Эффективность баковых смесей гербицидов с ПАВ, применяемых в посевах льна-долгунца

person.name: Soroka, S.V., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center for Arable Farming (Belarus). Institute of Plant Protection

abstract.value: In course of the research there were studied the herbicide Callisto, SC (mezotrion, 480 g/l) in pure state and in mixture with SAS atplus on vegetating flax (Linum usitatissimum) plants. The research was realized in the conditions of the Republic of Belarus in 2011-2012 (Minsk region) on a trial field of the Institute of Plant Protection in flax crops on sod-podzolic light loamy soil. As a result of realized research it was revealed efficiency estimation of the herbicides Harmony, 75% s.t.s. (thifensulphuronmethyl) and Aton, WDG (thifensulphuron-methyl, 750 g/kg) and their tank mixtures with the herbicides 2M-4X group in mixture with SAS trend 90 and Fortuna. The herbicides effect and their mixtures on flax cultivar Blakit yielding were determined. Biological efficiency of the herbicide Callisto, SC in flax crops, economic efficiency of application of the herbicide Callisto, SC in flax crops, effect of herbicides and their tank mixtures on number of weeds, vegetative mass, crop yields and structure of flax crops, economic efficiency of chemical weeding by herbicides were presented.
